working hours: Working hours: from 9:00 to 20:00 Kyiv time

about_info.1: Welcome to Tattoo Mall—our tattoo shop where industry enthusiasts, professional artists, and beginners taking their first steps in tattoo art come together. We understand how crucial it is to carefully and precisely select tools for productive tattoo sessions, and we help you quickly find exactly what will make them just that.
about_info.2: Our assortment is more than just tattoo equipment—it’s an entire team of knowledgeable and truly effective assistants on your workstation. After undergoing long development stages and countless tests under the close supervision of domestic engineers, cosmetologists, and globally recognized brands, these products have gained experience and improved every day. Now, they are ready to show what they are capable of and help you unlock your full potential.

urgent delivery.title: Urgent delivery
urgent delivery.info: Your purchases will be packed and shipped on the day the order is placed. As soon as the order is confirmed by a call from the manager, our staff will immediately pack and ship your order. Take advantage of this service — it will save you one day of waiting. This service is especially relevant if the order is placed closer to the weekend.

postal guarantee.title: Postal guarantee
postal guarantee.info: Additional protection for your shipment against accidental damage and spoilage during delivery. If anything happens to your purchases during transit—such as damage, breakage, or spillage—we will fully compensate you for the loss. The postal guarantee ensures your order will be delivered safely and intact.

extended Warranty.title: Extended Warranty
extended Warranty.info: Protect your purchases from loss and damage! By choosing the extended postal warranty, we will reimburse you for the full cost of the purchased item in case of total loss of the package or damage to the item during transportation by Russian Post or a shipping company. Additionally, you receive our 2-year warranty on all items in your order.

gift wrapping.title: Gift wrapping
gift wrapping.info: The best solution for a gift. We will beautifully wrap your order, and the delivery will be carried out by a courier company to you or another recipient, at your discretion. The details of the delivery will be confirmed during the call from the manager to confirm your order.
